headline.main: What Unhealthy Products Should CVS Stop Selling?

docs.abstract: Seeing itself as a health care company, CVS will stop selling tobacco products. Why stop there?
docs.snippet: Seeing itself as a health care company, CVS will stop selling tobacco products. Why stop there?

docs.lead_paragraph: Professors at the University of Colorado write that it is highly unethical for jails to capitalize on inmate addiction.
docs.snippet: Professors at the University of Colorado write that it is highly unethical for jails to capitalize on inmate addiction.

headline.main: U.S. Push to Export Dirty Fossil Fuels Parallels Past Action on Tobacco

docs.abstract: The U.S. is pushing to expand carbon exports, paralleling its history on tobacco.
docs.snippet: The U.S. is pushing to expand carbon exports, paralleling its history on tobacco.

headline.print_headline: Steroid Use Much Higher Among Gay and Bi Teen Boys
headline.main: Steroid Use Much Higher Among Gay and Bi Teen Boys

docs.lead_paragraph: Gay and bisexual teen boys use illicit steroids at a rate almost six times higher than do straight kids, a "dramatic disparity" that points up a need to reach out to this group, researchers say.
docs.snippet: Gay and bisexual teen boys use illicit steroids at a rate almost six times higher than do straight kids, a "dramatic disparity" that points up a need to reach out to this group, researchers say.
